summary: Replaces the Phenderix loading screens with something from good \'ol Uncle Sheo.
descriptionHtml:
I love the Phenderix Spells mod. It is really great. However, whenever I see a loading screen that isn\'t as crazy as it could be, my mind just... GETS LIKE UNCLE SHEO... ANd he\'s back again! This time in Phenderix! This mod replaces all of the Phenderix loading screens with something out of the mind of Sheogorath, daedric prince of Madness. Enjoy it!

Credits: Phenderix, his mod here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5898

Like this mod? Have JaySuS? Then perhaps you\'ll like this other Uncle Sheo mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24780

What about Climates of Tamriel? Want those loading Screens spiced up? Done. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24865

Dawnguard Loading Screens 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31766

**NEW** Hearthfire Loading Screens **NEW**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31820

**NEW** Frostfall Loading Screens **NEW**
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33738
author: Nonmeatbag
